name: Bird (itch)
description:
Bird is a side-scrolling shooter for MSX2.

It has 4 stages. At the end of each stage the boss waits.
When you touch the enemy, your power decreases.
Once you are out of power, the game is over.

- Controls
Arrow keys : Move
Space,[Z],A-Button : Shoot

2018 N.I
web: http://ni.x0.com/
